item.title: Project graveyard
item.description: I like to write code and always have - my earliest project is a band name generator from 2003. On Github I have over 230 repos, but I also have some on Bitbucket, Gitlab, and my own self-hosted fossil. Like others, I’ve had projects that I stopped working on and stopped using altogether - thus relegating them to the project graveyard. Here is a sliver of projects that ended up not meeting my expectations and have been buried in their grave of 1’s and 0’s.
